interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cheers: The Complete Series
Review Date: 2015/07/26
Store: Ted Danson  (Actor),     Kirstie Alley  (Actor),     Multiple  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets
Product Description: ["Wander in...pull up a stool...and make yourself at home where everybody knows your name with Cheers: The Complete Series, featuring all 270 episodes from 11 seasons, plus a host of exciting featurettes on 45 discs with vivid picture and sound quality. Ted Danson stars as Sam Malone, former relief-pitcher for the Boston Red Sox turned sober saloon owner of a popular neighborhood spot. Add a colorful cast of co-stars (Shelley Long, Kirstie Alley, Rhea Perlman, George Wendt, John Ratzenberger, Nicholas Colasanto, Woody Harrelson, and Kelsey Grammer) and you're all set to raise a glass to the legendary, 28-time Emmy ® Award -winning series GQ Magazine calls pretty much perfect."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Multiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea PerlmanMultiple, Ted Danson, Woody Harrelson, Kelsey Grammer, Shelley Long, John Ratzenberger, Kirstie Alley, George Wendt, Rhea Perlman  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '45', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.66 Pounds', 'Item model number': '32429219183', 'Director': 'Multiple', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '110 hours and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 5, 2015', 'Actors': 'Ted Danson, Kirstie Alley, Woody Harrelson, Shelley Long, Rhea Perlman', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '45'}
Review Text: Always loved this series, now I can watch whenever I want to.
Review Title: Great Series
Rating: 5.0

Everybody Loves Raymond: The Complete Series Various (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy ['Standup comedian Ray Romano stars as Ray Barone, a successful sportswriter who deals with his brother and parents, who happen to live across the street. profile:
User Summary:

This user showcases a robust affinity for classic comedic content, particularly series that blend nostalgia with exceptional storytelling. Their recent acquisition of a complete series underscores a profound appreciation for timeless humor, further solidifying their recognition of relatable family dynamics and engaging narratives. With an elevated average rating of 4.8, demonstrating a discerning taste and critical engagement with content, they utilize ratings as a key indicator of production quality.

Key preferences and trends:
- Strong inclination towards series that evoke nostalgia, exhibiting a deep connection to characters and humor that resonates on multiple levels.
- Maintains a critical perspective on production quality, consistently awarding high ratings to cherished series, reflective of strong storytelling and effective humor.
- Displays a preference for narratives that integrate mature themes with comedic elements, revealing a desire for substantial and thought-provoking entertainment.
- Their ratings indicate a willingness to explore various genres while favoring productions that provide both enjoyment and depth.

Overall, the user remains an engaged viewer who prioritizes impactful entertainment, blending nostalgia with humor. Their latest interaction reinforces their profile as a discerning consumer, valuing series that deliver a perfect balance of humor and storytelling excellence, allowing for seamless revisits to beloved classics whenever desired.
